summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.3°C) and outside temperature (down 3.2°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6908 lux) and cloud levels (up 326 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14398 lux), cloud levels (up 1789 m), feels like temperature (up 6.2°C), and outside temperature (up 5.1°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 326.3m lower than yesterday, 1179.9m lower than past week, 1789.3m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 939.3m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
